name: Alien Invasion (itch) (StruckDumb)
description:
After leaving your quaint, little home, you are informed that aliens have invaded! But who is infected, and who is on your side? Trust no one!

Originally made for the Ben Bonk Game Jam "Trust No One," this game was made in three days by me. Certain issues did not allow me to publish in time for submission, but here it is anyway! Enjoy.
